scaledmarkets.dabl.exec

Class ArtifactOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • scaledmarkets.dabl.exec.ArtifactOperator

  • public abstract class ArtifactOperator
extends java.lang.Object
    Perform an operation (specified by a derived class) on a collection of artifacts which are specified via include/exclude pattern sets. The sets of artifacts are potentially overlapping.

    • Field Summary

      void operateOnArtifacts(java.lang.String namespaceName, java.lang.String taskName, java.util.Set<Artifact> artifacts)
      Perform the specified operation on the specified set of artifacts, using the specified directory as a local work directory.
      protected abstract void operation(PatternSets patternSets)
      The operation to perform on the artifacts, once the includes and exclude patterns have been assembled.
